verses.verse: <S%G80>Brothers,<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>'s <S%G2107>desire<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> my <S%G1162>prayer<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G1519>that<s%> they may be <S%G4991>saved.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G3140>testify<s%> <S%G3140>about<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2205>zeal<s%> for <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G1922>knowledge.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> being ignorant <S%G50>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G2476>establish<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G5293>they<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> subject <S%G5293>themselves<s%> to the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G5056>fulfillment<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G4100>believes.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1125>writes<s%> about the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G3754><s%> "The <S%G444>one<s%> <S%G3754>who<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> will <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> which is <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> <S%G3779>this,<s%> <S%G3361>"Don't<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'Who will <S%G305>ascend<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven?<s%>' <S%G5124>(that<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> to <S%G2609>bring<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2609>down<s%>);

<S%G2228>or,<s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'Who will <S%G2597>descend<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G12>abyss?<s%>' <S%G5124>(that<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> to bring <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G321>up<s%> <S%G321><s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>)"

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> does <S%G3004>it<s%> <S%G4487>say?<s%> "The word <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> <S%G4675>you,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart;<s%>" <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2784>preach:<s%>

<S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you will <S%G3670>confess<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> you will be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> with the <S%G2588>heart,<s%> one <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> with the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> confession is <S%G3670>made<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G3956>"Whoever<s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2617>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G2617>disappointed.<s%>"

<S%G1063>For<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1293>distinction<s%> <S%G5037>between<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1672>Greek;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2962>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> Lord is <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3956>all,<s%> and is <S%G4147>rich<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> who call <S%G1941>on<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>
<S%G1063>For,<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3956>"Whoever<s%> will call <S%G1941>on<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>"

<S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> will they call on <S%G1941>him<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G4100>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4100>believed?<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4459>How<s%> will they <S%G4100>believe<s%> in him <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G191>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G191>heard?<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4459>How<s%> will they <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> a <S%G2784>preacher?<s%>

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> will they <S%G1437>preach<s%> <S%G3361>unless<s%> they are <S%G649>sent?<s%> <S%G2531>As<s%> it is <S%G1125>written:<s%> <S%G5613>"How<s%> <S%G5611>beautiful<s%> are the <S%G4228>feet<s%> of those who preach the Good <S%G2097>News<s%> of <S%G1515>peace,<s%> who bring glad <S%G2097>tidings<s%> of good <S%G18>things!<s%>"

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G5219>they<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5219>listen<s%> to the glad <S%G2098>news.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G189>report?<s%>"
<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> comes <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G189>hearing,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G189>hearing<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> I <S%G3361>say,<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G191>they<s%> <S%G191>hear?<s%> <S%G3304>Yes,<s%> most certainly, <S%G846>"Their<s%> <S%G5353>sound<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4009>ends<s%> of the <S%G3625>world.<s%>"

<S%G235>But<s%> I <S%G3361>ask,<s%> <S%G1097><s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1097>know?<s%> <S%G4413>First<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3361>says,<s%> <S%G1473>"I<s%> will <S%G3863>provoke<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to <S%G3863>jealousy<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> that which is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1484>nation,<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> a <S%G1484>nation<s%> void of <S%G801>understanding<s%> I will make <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3949>angry.<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> is very <S%G662>bold,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> "I was <S%G2147>found<s%> by <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3361>didn't<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G1691>me.<s%> I <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1717>revealed<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3361>didn't<s%> <S%G1905>ask<s%> <S%G1905>for<s%> <S%G1691>me.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> as <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> he <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G3650>"All<s%> day <S%G2250>long<s%> I stretched <S%G1600>out<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> a <S%G544>disobedient<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G483>contrary<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>"
